AD_MotherTalk_4.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_4.text: I've bags packed for myself and the kids, ready by the door. You should do the same.

AD_MotherTalk_0.speaker: Kimmy
AD_MotherTalk_0.text: But Mummy, I don't want to leave!

AD_MotherTalk_9.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_9.text: I know, sweetie, but we'll be safe in the wilds, all right?

AD_MotherTalk_11.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
AD_MotherTalk_11.text: The wilds? You throw a fit when there's no hot water - you wouldn't last a day out there!
AD_MotherTalk_11.context: NodeContext: thinks her friend is being ridiculous

AD_MotherTalk_1.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_1.text: It's run or sit on my arse praying! And the gods don't give a damn about us.

AD_MotherTalk_8.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_8.text: The Absolute's army will be here any day now.

AD_MotherTalk_6.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
AD_MotherTalk_6.text: Stop fretting - the Steelwatch will put a stop to them.
AD_MotherTalk_6.context: NodeContext: in denial, wants to change the subject

AD_MotherTalk_2.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_2.text: Those machines will form a circle 'round the upper city as soon as the fighting starts, mark my words. We'll be on our own.

AD_MotherTalk_12.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
AD_MotherTalk_12.text: Stop fretting - the Fist will stop them.
AD_MotherTalk_12.context: NodeContext: in denial, wants to change the subject

AD_MotherTalk_5.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_5.text: They're too busy with their precious patriars. We're on our own.

AD_MotherTalk_10.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
AD_MotherTalk_10.text: Why don't we talk about something else? Did you try that rye bread recipe I gave you?
AD_MotherTalk_10.context: NodeContext: trying to calm her friend down by changing the subject

AD_MotherTalk_7.speaker: Monifa Diallo
AD_MotherTalk_7.text: Really? The cult is on our doorstep and you want to talk about bread?
AD_MotherTalk_7.context: NodeContext: tried, exasperated, scared, snapping more than she intended

AD_MotherTalk_3.speaker: Kimmy
AD_MotherTalk_3.context: NodeContext: a little scared, her mum isn't herself

Mother01_0.speaker: Monifa Diallo
Mother01_0.text: The cult could raze this place to the ground and those upper city folks wouldn't even blink.

Mother01_1.speaker: Monifa Diallo
Mother01_1.text: The Absolute's army is on our doorstep. You want to live? Get out of here - before it's too late.

Mother02_0.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
Mother02_0.text: Would everyone please stop going on about the 'Absolute's army'? The Fist will sort it all out, you'll see.
Mother02_0.context: NodeContext: burying her head in the sand, very much in denial about the incoming army

Mother02_1.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
Mother02_1.text: Between stockpiling food and barricading doors, this cult business has driven half of Rivington mad.
Mother02_1.context: NodeContext: burying her head in the sand, very much in denial about the incoming army

Mother02_2.speaker: Ha-yoon Kim
Mother02_2.text: Would everyone please stop going on about the 'Absolute's army'? Lord Gortash is going to sort it all out, you'll see.
Mother02_2.context: NodeContext: burying her head in the sand, very much in denial about the incoming army

Child_0.speaker: Kimmy
Child_0.text: I want to go home but mummy keeps talking.

Child_1.speaker: Kimmy
Child_1.text: Mummy keeps talking about some 'army', but she won't tell me anything about it! I'm not a baby.
